mapper.select: SELECT prkCenterId, prkPlceNm, prkPlceAdres, prkPlceEntrcLa, prkPlceEntrcLo, pkfcParkingLotsTotal, pkfcAvailableParkingLotsTotla FROM prksttusinfo p, prkrealtimeinfo r where p.prkCenterId = r.prkRealTimeId and prkPlceEntrcLa BETWEEN #{lat} - 0.008 AND #{lat} + 0.008 AND prkPlceEntrcLo BETWEEN #{lng} - 0.008 AND #{lng} + 0.008
mapper.insert: insert into cart(cartMid, cartProduct, cartSellerId, cartTitle, cartPrice, cartImage, cartContent, cartInventory, cartCount) values('user1', #{cartProduct}, #{cartSellerId}, #{cartTitle}, #{cartPrice}, #{cartImage}, #{cartContent}, #{cartInventory}, #{cartCount})
mapper.update: update cart set cartCount=#{cartCount} where cartNum=#{cartNum}
mapper.select: select count(*) from cart where cartMid='user1' and cartProduct=#{cartProduct};
